wiki_section_title: Selected filmography -- Malayalam

wiki_section_text: Complete list of Madhavi 's Malayalam Movies are available from the MSI Database . [ 11 ]

intro: Madhavi is an Indian film actress known for her works in Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, Hindi and Oriya cinema. In a career spanning seventeen years, she has acted in around three hundred films. She was one of the top actresses from 1976 to 1996 in Telugu & Tamil films.

qa.question: What is the age difference of the lovers in the 1982 Malayalam film in which the actress Madhavi played Saritha ?
